ygData.subject: RE: utter fustration (but with a humorous ending) - OT
ygData.msgSnippet: same here.  myself and 2 friends in town all started day one, and grouped up to level 16 together.  then they switched servers, though even then i am sure my
ygData.messageBody:
same here. myself and 2 friends in town all started day one, and grouped up
to level 16 together. then they switched servers, though even then i am
sure my solo time is extremely minimal since.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> I'm a special case. My wife started her first character, a
> warrior, when I
> started my bard and my brother-in-law started his third character, a
> Paladin, all at the same time. I did levels 1 through 5
> grouped with them.
> My first character is a retired level 21 mage that I haven't
> logged on with
> in months and consider retired.
